doc.title: Flash 10
doc.plot: Documentary featuring the making of the films _No somos de piedra (1968)_ (qv) and _Diablo bajo la almohada, El (1967)_ (qv), the publication of the Fotogramas magazine's 1000th issue, and a Jacques Lauran fashion show performed by artists from the film _Escala en Hi-Fi (1963)_ (qv).
